headline: Ask HN: How to restart tech career from scratch at 36?
description:
This last decade has been a tough one and I find myself with a deep sense of stuck-ness and hopelessness.

A little background: Due to familial/personal circumstances, I studied a non-tech discipline through grad school with the goal of eventually getting into tech. After finishing, I eventually found my way to joining the founding team of an early stage startup where for the next 6 years I ran around like a headless chicken. Whether for lack of education, experience, mentorship, or volition, I learned very little about how to systematically build a product and business. The whole experience was taxing.

I left the company to spend the next couple years working on my mental health. It became clear that much of my ineffectiveness was due to deeply-rooted fears, self-hatred, and maladaptive behaviors due to severe childhood trauma.

Now at 36, I do find myself in a much better place. I've arrived at more of an understanding of who I am, my values, the kind of life I want to live. But I do feel as if I've squandered almost a decade of professional potential. I have good intuitive product and design sense, but have very very little in the way of effective skills, such as understanding and facilitating a product development process. Additionally, I have a very small network, if at all.

Where do I go from here? Do I seek a mentor / life coach to help me build a practical path forward? Back to school? And where do I begin building a professional network? Will a company even look in my direction at this point?

Thanks.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何在36岁时从零开始重启科技事业？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 如何在36歲時從零開始重啟科技事業？
description_zh-Hans:
过去的十年是一个艰难的十年，我发现自己有一种深深的困顿和无望感。

一点背景。由于家庭/个人的原因，我在研究生院学习了一门非技术学科，目的是为了最终进入技术领域。完成学业后，我最终发现自己加入了一家早期创业公司的创始团队，在接下来的6年里，我像一只无头鸡一样到处跑。不管是由于缺乏教育、经验、导师指导还是自愿，我对如何系统地建立一个产品和业务了解甚少。

我离开了公司，在接下来的几年里努力改善我的心理健康。很明显，我的效率低下主要是由于根深蒂固的恐惧、自我憎恨以及因严重的童年创伤而产生的适应不良的行为。我对自己是谁、我的价值观、我想过的生活有了更多了解。但我确实感觉到我已经浪费了近十年的职业潜力。我有很好的产品和设计的直觉，但在有效的技能方面，例如理解和促进产品开发过程方面，我的技能非常非常少。此外，我的人脉也非常少，如果有的话。

我应该怎么做呢？我是否要找一个导师/人生导师来帮助我建立一条实用的前进道路？回到学校吗？我应该从哪里开始建立一个专业网络？在这一点上，会有公司看中我的方向吗？

谢谢。
